channel.title: [SRL] Willow Buyer+Banker [V.0.81]
channel.description:
[CENTER][size=15pt](060616)Draynor Willow Buyer+Banker. 0.81[/size]
[size=13pt]Compatible with SRL 2.40 and the new RS-Engine.[/size]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B]SRL Willow Buyer+Banker. 0.81 by Cheesehunk.[/B]
Uses SRL Version 2.40 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This Script will buy Willow logs from Lumbridge general store, and bank in Draynor.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B]General Notice.[/B] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[B]Not recommened for players under level 15 (Bannage!) It will buy+bank about 7 loads an hour.
This is my first SRL/Real Runescape script, so comments are appreciated.[/B]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B]Credits.[/B] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/CENTER] -Fakawi (3 DTM's for bankers+Thread Style+Some small script stuff+Suggested this script a couple months back.) -Phantombmx (His FindGerrant Function.)
[CENTER]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B]Instructions.[/B] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/CENTER] 1. Use official RuneScape Client, Low Detail. 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. 3. Position your characters at Draynor bank Southern most bankslot. 4. Manually align the Minimap North as much as possible. 5. Fill in the constansts, and set your players under [B]DeclarePlayers;[/B] 6. Place a sufficent amount of coins in each of your players first bank slot. 7. Run the script.
[IMG]http://img86.imageshack.us/img86/6839/setupwillow7to.png[/img]
[CENTER]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B]Features.[/B] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/CENTER] - Full AutoColor! (Mostly by Fakawi) - Buys, and banks a solid 180+ Willows per hour. - Walking works 95% of the time. - Full MultiPlayer SRL based. - AntiBan procedures such as BoredHuman, PickUpMouse, RandomChat, etc.. - Identifies and handles All Talking Randoms. - SRL 2.40 compliant. - Very quick banking, using OpenDraynorQuiet; - Idle logout, because when you log out manually, your actions are sent to Jagex. - Longest walking in a Public script that I know of. (Please correct me if I am wrong.) - Awesome AntiBan routine! (PeeBreakEvery;, BoredWhileFlagExists;, etc..) - Makes the script start running about every 20 Mins (not many gathering scripts do that.)
[CENTER]------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B]Known Issues.[/B] -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/CENTER] [B]- Walk back messes up sometimes (rarely.)[/B] - None! Please watch the script's first loop to make sure everything is working well, and post bugs!
Enjoy! Cheesehunk.[br][size=1]Posted at: June 18, 2006, 03:32:40 pm[/size][hr][size=14pt][B]Reserved: Progress Reports![/B][/size]
[code]<============== -0.75- Progress Report ===============> Worked for 1 Hours, 13 Minutes and 52 Seconds Banked 11 Loads[s]. About 297 Willows. Opened 0 Door[s].
[]++----------------------------------++[] Name : Username, Number : 0 Worked for : 12 minutes, Banked : 4 Load[s] Willows : 108 Active : True, Loc : Bank []++----------------------------------++[] 0 : Username = True . - B :4 Times. - : 12 mins. - Loc: Bank 1 : Username = True . - B :2 Times. - : 13 mins. - Loc: Bank 2 : Username = True . - B :2 Times. - : 12 mins. - Loc: Bank 3 : Username = False . - B :1 Times. - : 10 mins. - Loc: To Bank //Messed up trying to find RoadColor. 4 : Username = True . - B :2 Times. - : 12 mins. - Loc: Bank []++----------------------------------++[] [/code]
After 11 loads, check out the RoadColor array: [SIZE=7pt]RoadColor[1] = 7434874 RoadColor[2] = 7368568 RoadColor[3] = 7236982 RoadColor[4] = 7171702 RoadColor[5] = 7303288 RoadColor[6] = 7171958 RoadColor[7] = 7040372 RoadColor[8] = 6908529 RoadColor[9] = 6777199 RoadColor[10] = 6776943 RoadColor[11] = 7039860 RoadColor[12] = 6908273 RoadColor[13] = 7435130 RoadColor[14] = 7566716 RoadColor[15] = 7566460 RoadColor[16] = 7566204 RoadColor[17] = 7303544[/size]
Now that's a lot of walking!

@Cheesehunk wrote:

No problem, it should compile, and work.

Just be sure to follow all the instructions.

item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Well we’re in the SRL members section, aren’t we?

Nice script though, I looked it over, and it seems good, but do F2P worlds really have a lot of willows sold to their shops???

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL] Willow Buyer+Banker [V.0.81]
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[CENTER]size=15ptDraynor Willow Buyer+Banker. 0.81[/size]

[size=13pt]Compatible with SRL 2.40 and the new RS-Engine.[/size]

SRL Willow Buyer+Banker. 0.81
by Cheesehunk.

Uses SRL Version 2.40

This Script will buy Willow logs from Lumbridge general store, and bank in Draynor.

General Notice.

[B]Not recommened for players under level 15 (Bannage!)
It will buy+bank about 7 loads an hour.

This is my first SRL/Real Runescape script, so comments are appreciated.[/B]

Credits.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/CENTER]
-Fakawi (3 DTM’s for bankers+Thread Style+Some small script stuff+Suggested this script a couple months back.)
-Phantombmx (His FindGerrant Function.)

[CENTER]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/CENTER]

  1. Use official RuneScape Client, Low Detail.
  2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color.
  3. Position your characters at Draynor bank Southern most bankslot.
  4. Manually align the Minimap North as much as possible.
  5. Fill in the constansts, and set your players under DeclarePlayers;
  6. Place a sufficent amount of coins in each of your players first bank slot.
  7. Run the script.

[CENTER]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Features.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/CENTER]

  • Full AutoColor! (Mostly by Fakawi)
  • Buys, and banks a solid 180+ Willows per hour.
  • Walking works 95% of the time.
  • Full MultiPlayer SRL based.
  • AntiBan procedures such as BoredHuman, PickUpMouse, RandomChat, etc…
  • Identifies and handles All Talking Randoms.
  • SRL 2.40 compliant.
  • Very quick banking, using OpenDraynorQuiet;
  • Idle logout, because when you log out manually, your actions are sent to Jagex.
  • Longest walking in a Public script that I know of. (Please correct me if I am wrong.)
  • Awesome AntiBan routine! (PeeBreakEvery;, BoredWhileFlagExists;, etc…)
  • Makes the script start running about every 20 Mins (not many gathering scripts do that.)

[CENTER]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Known Issues.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/CENTER]
- Walk back messes up sometimes (rarely.)

  • None! Please watch the script’s first loop to make sure everything is working well, and post bugs!

Enjoy!
Cheesehunk.[br][size=1]Posted at: June 18, 2006, 03:32:40 pm[/size][hr][size=14pt]Reserved: Progress Reports![/size]
